articles.title: Dzulfiqar Fathur Rahman
articles.contents:
dfrblog

          Projects
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Dzulfiqar Fathur Rahman
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn

                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Data journalist
            Hi! Currently, I analyze data and make charts to tell
            stories at Katadata, a
            Central Jakarta-based media focusing on economic news. I
            cover various datasets, ranging from cooking
            oil prices to the
            mood of songs on Spotify.
            Prior to this, I covered business and economic news for
            The Jakarta Post, a
            leading English-speaking media based in Central Jakarta,
            between October 2019 and
            March 2022.
            I also take side gigs. My latest was analyzing a survey
            on digital skills of the youth in Southeast Asia for LOKA Group, a
            nonprofit research consultancy—which served the ASEAN
            Foundation as the client in this project. I worked on this
            project between October 2021
            and April 2022.
            I have given virtual talks about data journalism to a
            summer course at Universitas Diponegoro, a student
            publication at Universitas Pelita Harapan and a student
            executive body at Universitas Indonesia.
            Why, yes, I code—mostly in R.
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Dzulfiqar Fathur Rahman

articles.title: Projects
articles.contents:
Data journalism at The Jakarta Post

Code, data and documentation behind the analysis and graphics in my stories on The Jakarta Post.

2021–2022






jpwrapper

An R package to customize Datawrapper charts with design principles I use at The Jakarta Post.

January 2021
